item.title: Snowdonia through the eyes of a Fellwanderer
item.author: Ming Toh,
item.description: There is a rumour that there are more sheep than humans in Wales. And all the road signs are in Welsh and English. Plus you can see the Milky Way when the weather is nice. Intrigued? Come and find out for yourself! Wales has several national parks with quite different features. Snowdonia National â€¦
